description:
New:

- Yale, Bopomofo/Zhuyin, and IPA: You can now choose to use Yale, Bopomofo/Zhuyin, and IPA to display pronunciation, in addition to the existing Jyutping and Pinyin. Thanks for the feature request @vintotal!
- Wildcard searching: When searching using Simplified/Traditional Chinese, Jyutping, or Pinyin, you can now use * and ? as wildcards to mean any number of characters and one character respectively. For example, maybe you remember a 成語 ending with 鄉 — you could search ???鄉 to find 走鄉隨鄉!
- Exact match searching: Surrounding your search with "" quotes means that the dictionary will only find entries that match exactly what is enclosed within the quotes. For example, "鄉" will return only the entry 鄉, not 鄉鎮 or 走鄉隨鄉.
- Adjust interface size: If you find that the interface was too small before, good news! You can make it humongous or tiny, with five size settings. @AlienKevin this one’s for you!
- Magnify and Open In New Window: To see a larger version of an entry, or open it in a different window, there are new buttons in the entry detail view.
- New dictionaries: If you are a new user, the program now comes with HSK3 tags and Wiktionary! If you're upgrading from an older version, please visit the Jyut Dictionary website to download and add these new dictionaries.

Improvements:

- Refreshed light mode UI on Windows and Linux: Light more now has less grey, and the UI has been updated to fit in better with Windows 11.
- Immediate settings: Settings now apply immediately instead of on next search.
- More obvious search options: Buttons to switch between Simplified Chinese/Traditional Chinese/Jyutping/Pinyin/English are now larger and not abbreviated. @derekyin this is for you!
- Pour les utilisateurs francophones : La version 2016 de CFDICT, qui contient beaucoup plus d'entrées et définitions, est maintenant disponible! Pour en savoir plus, veuillez cliquer sur ce lien.

Notes:

- On Ubuntu 20.04: You must run `sudo add-apt-repository ppa:beineri/opt-qt-5.15.2-focal` before installing the .deb file. This version drops support for Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04.
